6 Dropdown

Toggleable, contextual menu for displaying lists of links. Made interactive with the dropdown JavaScript plugin.

This UI need to apply bootstrap-dropdown.js

Via data attributes

Add data-toggle="dropdown" to a link or button to toggle a dropdown. 

<div class="dropdown">
  <a class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#">Dropdown trigger</a>
  <ul class="dropdown-menu" role="menu" aria-labelledby="dLabel">
    ...
  </ul>
</div>

Via JavaScript

Call the dropdown via JavaScript: 

$('.dropdown-toggle').dropdown();

6.1 Dropdown

HTML markup
<div class="dropdown open">
    <ul class="dropdown-menu pull-right" role="menu" aria-labelledby="folderMenu" id="menu1">
        <li><a href="#" class="renameFolder">Rename</a></li>
        <li><a href="#" class="deleteFolder">Delete</a></li>
        <li><a href="#" class="addFolder">Add folder</a></li>
    </ul>
</div>
normal
Original status
  • Rename
  • Delete
  • Add folder

6.2 Dropdown menu in the header

If you put Dropdown in the Trend Header section, you will notice it change to highlight the whole item.

We reverse the color to highlight the links in the header bar.

HTML markup
<div class="wrapper">
<div class="trend-header">
    <div class="container">
        <div class="row-fluid">
            <div class="trend-header-wrapper navbar span24 clearfix">
                <h1 class="product-name pull-left">
                    <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productsymbol.png" alt="" class="logo">
                    <img src="img/trend/ic_logo_productname.png" alt="Product Name" class="product-name">
                </h1>
                <ul class="nav pull-right">
                    <li id="header-user" class="dropdown header-user">
                        <a class="dropdown-toggle expand-down" data-toggle="dropdown" href="#" id="userMenuHeader">Randy Lien</a>
                        <ul class="dropdown-menu pull-right" role="menu" aria-labelledby="userMenuHeader" id="userMenu">
                            <li><a href="#">Settings</a></li>
                            <li>
                               <a href="#" class="" data-toggle="dropdown">Log out</a>
                               <ul class="dropdown-submenu dropdown-menu" aria-labelledby="subMenu">
                                   <li>
                                       <a href="#">Sub Settings</a>
                                   </li>
                                   <li>
                                       <a href="#">Sub Settings</a>
                                   </li>
                                   <li>
                                       <a href="#">Sub Settings</a>
                                   </li>
                               </ul>
                           </li>
                        </ul>
                    </li>
                </ul>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
normal
Original status

  • Randy Lien
    • Settings
    • Log out
      • Sub Settings
      • Sub Settings
      • Sub Settings
